casebody.data:
IN RE: M.A.W. 279PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 25, 2017 Rebekah W. Davis, Attorney at Law, for Allen, Anthony Brock. Regina Floyd-Davis, Attorney at Law, for New Hanover County DSS. William L. Esser, IV, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for GAL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th of August 2017 by Guardian Ad Litem to Amend Guardian Ad Litem New Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th of August 2017."
